mapper.select: SELECT T1.BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_ID /* 채권접촉제외대상ID */ , DECODE(T1.CTNT_EXCD_OJ_TP_CD,'03','안내서','04','촉구서') AS FW_DV_NM , T1.CST_NO , SUBSTR(T1.APY_STRTDT,0,6) AS APY_STRTDT , SUBSTR(T1.APY_ENDDT,0,6) AS APY_ENDDT , SUBSTR(T1.FST_RGST_DTM,0,8) AS FST_RGST_DTM , (SELECT USR_NM FROM T_CMP_USR_ACO_M WHERE USR_ID = T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID AND DEL_YN = 'N') AS USR_NM FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_IZ T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND #{baseYm} BETWEEN SUBSTR(T1.APY_STRTDT,0,6) AND SUBSTR(T1.APY_ENDDT,0,6) AND T1.CTNT_EXCD_OJ_TP_CD = DECODE(#{schFwDv},'01','03','02','04') AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_CBBO_BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_IZ /* 채권접촉제외대상내역 */ SET APY_ENDDT = TO_CHAR(TRUNC(LAST_DAY(#{apyEnddt},'YYYYMM')),'YYYYMMDD') /* 적용종료일자 */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_ID = #{bndCntcExcdOjId} /* 채권접촉제외대상ID */

MERGE INTO TB_CBBO_BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_IZ T1 /* 채권접촉제외대상내역 */ USING ( SELECT #{ctntExcdOjTpCd} AS CTNT_EXCD_OJ_TP_CD /* 연락제외대상유형코드 */ , #{cstNo} AS CST_NO /* 고객번호 */ , TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{apyStrtdt},'YYYYMM')),'YYYYMMDD') AS APY_STRTDT /* 적용시작일자 */ , TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{apyEnddt},'YYYYMM')),'YYYYMMDD') AS APY_ENDDT /* 적용종료일자 */ FROM DUAL ) T2 ON (T1.CST_NO = T2.CST_NO /* 고객번호 */ AND T1.CTNT_EXCD_OJ_TP_CD = T2.CTNT_EXCD_OJ_TP_CD /* 연락제외대상유형코드 */ AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET APY_STRTDT = T2.APY_STRTDT , APY_ENDDT = T2.APY_ENDDT WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_ID , CTNT_EXCD_BND_BIZ_CD , CTNT_EXCD_OJ_TP_CD , CTNT_EXCD_MEDI_TP_CD , CLCTAM_OG_TP_CD , CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO , CST_NO , CLCTN_OJ_OG_TP_CD , CLCTN_OJ_PRTNR_NO , LOCARA_TNO , EXNO_ENCR , IDV_TNO , APY_STRTDT , APY_ENDDT , CTNT_EXCD_RSON_DV_CD , EXCD_MO_CN , BND_CLCTN_MSG_BOO_ID , DTA_DL_YN , FST_RGST_DTM , FST_RGST_USR_ID , FST_RGST_PRG_ID , FST_RGST_DEPT_ID , FNL_MDFC_DTM , FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , FNL_MDFC_PRG_ID , FNL_MDFC_DEPT_ID ) VALUES ( TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDhh24miss') || LPAD((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_IZ WHERE SUBSTR(FST_RGST_DTM, 0,8) = TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD'))+1, 6, '0') , NULL , T2.CTNT_EXCD_OJ_TP_CD , NULL , NULL , NULL , T2.CST_NO , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , T2.APY_STRTDT , T2.APY_ENDDT , NULL , NULL , NULL , 'N' )
